column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Best food we had in Chicago! We went in pretty irritated because we had a reservation and there was still over a twenty minute wait despite being on time
column2: but the food and the service more than made up for it. The Paella Valenciana which has confit pork shoulder
column4: chorizo ibérico & chicharrónes was unbelievable! Pricey
column5: but worth it for a special night out! Peach sangria was great
column6: and I could eat the brussels sprout salad with candied marcona almonds and manchego cheese for the rest of my life and die happy. Beef Tenderloin & Blue Cheese served with housemade chips was also really good.
